data.yamlPipeline:
pipeline:
  name: testPipeline_Cypress12
  identifier: testPipeline_Cypress12
  projectIdentifier: Pratyush_TestZone
  orgIdentifier: default
  tags: {}
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: testStage_Cypress
        identifier: testStage_Cypress
        description: s
        type: Deployment
        spec:
          deploymentType: Kubernetes
          service:
            serviceRef: <+input>
            serviceInputs: <+input>
          environment:
            environmentRef: <+input>
            deployToAll: false
            provisioner:
              steps:
                - step:
                    type: K8sDryRun
                    name: Prov_Step_Node_1
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Node_1
                    spec: {}
                    timeout: 10m
                - step:
                    type: K8sDryRun
                    name: Prov_Step_Node_2
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Node_2
                    spec: {}
                    timeout: 10m
                - stepGroup:
                    name: Prov_Step_Group_Node_0
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Group_Node_0
                    steps:
                      - step:
                          type: K8sDryRun
                          name: Prov_Step_Node_3
                          identifier: Prov_Step_Node_3
                          spec: {}
                          timeout: 10m
                      - step:
                          type: K8sDryRun
                          name: Prov_Step_Node_4
                          identifier: Prov_Step_Node_4
                          spec: {}
                          timeout: 10m
                      - step:
                          type: K8sDryRun
                          name: Prov_Step_Node_5
                          identifier: Prov_Step_Node_5
                          spec: {}
                          timeout: 10m
                - step:
                    type: ShellScriptProvision
                    name: Prov_Step_Node_6
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Node_6
                    spec:
                      source:
                        type: Inline
                        spec:
                          script: <+input>
                      environmentVariables: []
                    timeout: 10m
                - parallel:
                    - step:
                        type: K8sDryRun
                        name: Prov_Step_Node_7
                        identifier: Prov_Step_Node_7
                        spec: {}
                        timeout: 10m
                    - step:
                        type: K8sDryRun
                        name: Prov_Step_Node_8
                        identifier: Prov_Step_Node_8
                        spec: {}
                        timeout: 10m
                - step:
                    type: K8sDryRun
                    name: Prov_Step_Node_9
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Node_9
                    spec: {}
                    timeout: 10m
                - parallel:
                    - stepGroup:
                        name: Prov_Step_Group_Node_1
                        identifier: Prov_Step_Group_Node_1
                        steps:
                          - parallel:
                              - step:
                                  type: Barrier
                                  name: Prov_Node_1
                                  identifier: Prov_Node_1
                                  spec:
                                    barrierRef: <+input>
                                  timeout: 10m
                              - stepGroup:
                                  name: Prov_Step_Group_Node_2
                                  identifier: Prov_Step_Group_Node_2
                                  steps:
                                    - step:
                                        type: K8sDryRun
                                        name: Prov_Step_Node_10
                                        identifier: Prov_Step_Node_10
                                        spec: {}
                                        timeout: 10m
                    - stepGroup:
                        name: Prov_Step_Group_Node_3
                        identifier: Prov_Step_Group_Node_3
                        steps:
                          - step:
                              type: K8sDryRun
                              name: Prov_Step_Node_11
                              identifier: Prov_Step_Node_11
                              spec: {}
                              timeout: 10m
                - stepGroup:
                    name: Prov_Step_Group_Node_4
                    identifier: Prov_Step_Group_Node_4
                    steps:
                      - step:
                          type: HarnessApproval
                          name: Prov_Node_2
                          identifier: Prov_Node_2
                          spec:
                            approvalMessage: Please review the following information and approve the pipeline progression
                            includePipelineExecutionHistory: true
                            isAutoRejectEnabled: false
                            approvers:
                              userGroups: <+input>
                              minimumCount: 1
                              disallowPipelineExecutor: false
                            approverInputs: []
                          timeout: 1d
            environmentInputs: <+input>
            serviceOverrideInputs: <+input>
            infrastructureDefinitions: <+input>
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  name: Step_Node_1
                  identifier: Step_Node_1
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Template_Step_Node_2
                  identifier: Template_Step_Node_2
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Template_Step_Node_3
                  identifier: Template_Step_Node_3
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - stepGroup:
                  name: Step_Group_Node_0
                  identifier: Step_Group_Node_0
                  steps:
                    - step:
                        name: Template_Step_Node_4
                        identifier: Template_Step_Node_4
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
                    - step:
                        name: Template_Step_Node_5
                        identifier: Template_Step_Node_5
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
                    - step:
                        name: Template_Step_Node_6
                        identifier: Template_Step_Node_6
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Template_Step_Node_7
                  identifier: rolloutDeployment
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - parallel:
                  - step:
                      name: Template_Step_Node_8
                      identifier: Template_Step_Node_8
                      template:
                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                        versionLabel: "1"
                  - step:
                      name: Template_Step_Node_9
                      identifier: Template_Step_Node_9
                      template:
                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                        versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Template_Step_Node_10
                  identifier: Template_Step_Node_10
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - parallel:
                  - stepGroup:
                      name: Step_Group_Node_1
                      identifier: Step_Group_Node_1
                      steps:
                        - parallel:
                            - step:
                                type: Barrier
                                name: Node_1
                                identifier: Node_1
                                spec:
                                  barrierRef: <+input>
                                timeout: 10m
                            - stepGroup:
                                name: Step_Group_Node_2
                                identifier: Step_Group_Node_2
                                steps:
                                  - step:
                                      name: Template_Step_Node_11
                                      identifier: Template_Step_Node_11
                                      template:
                                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                                        versionLabel: "1"
                  - stepGroup:
                      name: Step_Group_Node_3
                      identifier: Step_Group_Node_3
                      steps:
                        - step:
                            name: Step_Node_12
                            identifier: Step_Node_12
                            template:
                              templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                              versionLabel: "1"
              - stepGroup:
                  name: Step_Group_Node_4
                  identifier: Step_Group_Node_4
                  steps:
                    - step:
                        type: HarnessApproval
                        name: Node_2
                        identifier: Node_2
                        spec:
                          approvalMessage: Please review the following information and approve the pipeline progression
                          includePipelineExecutionHistory: true
                          isAutoRejectEnabled: false
                          approvers:
                            userGroups: <+input>
                            minimumCount: 1
                            disallowPipelineExecutor: false
                          approverInputs: []
                        timeout: 1d
            rollbackSteps:
              - step:
                  name: Rollback_Step_Node_1
                  identifier: Rollback_Step_Node_1
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_2
                  identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_2
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_3
                  identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_3
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - stepGroup:
                  name: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_0
                  identifier: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_0
                  steps:
                    - step:
                        name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_4
                        identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_4
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
                    - step:
                        name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_5
                        identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_5
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
                    - step:
                        name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_6
                        identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_6
                        template:
                          templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                          versionLabel: "1"
                  when:
                    condition: "false"
                    stageStatus: Success
              - step:
                  name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_7
                  identifier: rollbackRolloutDeployment
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - parallel:
                  - step:
                      name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_8
                      identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_8
                      template:
                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                        versionLabel: "1"
                  - step:
                      name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_9
                      identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_9
                      template:
                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                        versionLabel: "1"
              - step:
                  name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_10
                  identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_10
                  template:
                    templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                    versionLabel: "1"
              - parallel:
                  - stepGroup:
                      name: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_1
                      identifier: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_1
                      steps:
                        - parallel:
                            - step:
                                type: Barrier
                                name: Rollback_Node_1
                                identifier: Rollback_Node_1
                                spec:
                                  barrierRef: <+input>
                                timeout: 10m
                            - stepGroup:
                                name: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_2
                                identifier: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_2
                                steps:
                                  - step:
                                      name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_11
                                      identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_11
                                      template:
                                        templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                                        versionLabel: "1"
                                when:
                                  condition: "false"
                                  stageStatus: Success
                      when:
                        condition: "false"
                        stageStatus: Success
                  - stepGroup:
                      name: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_3
                      identifier: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_3
                      steps:
                        - step:
                            name: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_12
                            identifier: Rollback_Template_Step_Node_12
                            template:
                              templateRef: Cypress_Step_Template
                              versionLabel: "1"
                      when:
                        condition: "false"
                        stageStatus: Success
              - stepGroup:
                  name: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_4
                  identifier: Rollback_Step_Group_Node_4
                  steps:
                    - step:
                        type: HarnessApproval
                        name: Rollback_Node_2
                        identifier: Rollback_Node_2
                        spec:
                          approvalMessage: Please review the following information and approve the pipeline progression
                          includePipelineExecutionHistory: true
                          isAutoRejectEnabled: false
                          approvers:
                            userGroups: <+input>
                            minimumCount: 1
                            disallowPipelineExecutor: false
                          approverInputs: []
                        timeout: 1d
                  when:
                    condition: "false"
                    stageStatus: Success
        tags: {}
        failureStrategies:
          - onFailure:
              errors:
                - AllErrors
              action:
                type: StageRollback
